name: Badass Banger
description:
This is a game for all the players out there. Pun intended. 
Your mission: Becoming the Badass Banger! Tap away at the little buns and fill your Badass-O-Meter to advance in rank! Watch out for police-butts though, they’ll throw your butt in jail! Have you ever felt you just need to tap some booty? Well, now it’s right in your pocket!
Share your Badass Status with your friends! The more you tap the booty, the better your status! Have a badass blast with Badass Banger!
